name: TV.com - Simple Grey [No sunglasses!]
description:
Removes unwanted elements from TV.com.
Completely revamps the new bright blue/white lay-out in an grey-based lay-out with different blue as much as possible. (the blue from before they changed everything!)

Note 1:
Designed only for Firefox.

Note 2: 
Do not use this style if you (want to) log-in on TV.com!
The same probably applies for watching episodes on line.

Note 3: 
It's working is only checked on the following pages:
- Front Page (not 100% done yet)
- Show Overview
- Episode Guide
- Episode Page 
- Photos
additional_info:
Update 20110923: Quick fix to remove the new blue header
Update 20111224: Redesign to correct the new bright blue lay-out
